Title: Dragon Keeping
Description:
First he opposes dragonkind, then he enslaves them, denying them their birthrights.

We shall visit these so-called "Halls of Valor," defeat any who oppose us, and liberate the storm drakes from that which binds them.

Come along.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Vyranoth and complete the Storm the Halls of Valor scenario.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Vyranoth to go to the Halls of Valor
Complete Scenario: Storming the Halls of Valor
